entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
